price: Imetoka kwa Sulaiman nayo ni: Kwa jina la Mwenyezi Mungu, Mwingi wa rehema, Mwenye kurehemu.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مِن سُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَإِنَّهُۥ بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
footnotes: Kisha akawasomea hiyo barua, nayo imeanzia kwa jina la Mwenyezi Mungu Mwenye utukufu na neema zote, ambaye daima anawamiminia waja wake rehema zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innahu min sulaymāna wa-innahu bis'mi al-lahi al-raḥmāni al-raḥīmi
